Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Henat with a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in high relief holding an adze, a hoe and the cord of a seed-bag which hangs over the shoulder, the lower body and leg section is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of the Book of The Dead in eight rows of incised Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
